name: DEPOSIT for a Custom 15" Wooly Babe - Handmade Waldorf-Inspired Doll
description:
This is the deposit and first payment of a custom 15" Wooly Babe - Handmade Waldorf-Inspired Doll. You choose the skin, and eye colours, as well as if you'd like your doll blushed. You purchase the hair/yarn, and clothing as described below. The final payment will total your doll price at $210.

With every 15″ doll purchased, a 10" Weighted Wooly Babe and $20 is donated to a terminally ill child and their family.

Handcrafted with love. We use quality materials so your babe's babe lasts a LONG time!

*****************************************
Skin:
YOUR CHOICE of 5 shades in the photos of this listing.
(T102, T114, T105, T106, T104)

Eyes:
YOUR CHOICE of 5 shades in the photos of this listing.

Hair:
YOUR CHOICE of any skein in this section of our store:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/WoolyBattsYarnsBabes?section_id=12542647
(please purchase separately, and we will take it off of the top of the end purchase amount)

Hair Highlights (optional):
YOUR CHOICE of any skein in this section of our store:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/WoolyBattsYarnsBabes?section_id=12745315
(please purchase separately, and we will take it off of the top of the end purchase amount)

Clothing:
YOUR CHOICE of any outfit in this section of our store:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/WoolyBattsYarnsBabes?section_id=12672294
(please purchase separately, and we will take it off of the top of the end purchase amount)

Blush: Food Grade Beeswax

Stuffing: 100% wool
*****************************************

Please allow 2 weeks from the day of purchase/instructions finalization for the completion of your doll.

Gallery:
https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.345924275457561.76920.236356649747658&type=3

name: Donation Items: 10" Weighted Wooly Babes
description:
When a 15" Wooly Babe is sold, we will donate a 10" Weighted Wooly Babe and $20 to families with children who are severely ill.

These are handmade Waldorf/Steiner inspired weighted dolls that are swaddled (permanently) in OH SO SOFT minky fabric! These dolls have thick 100% cotton skin, are stuffed with 100% wool and heavy beads to create a more life-like feel. Their faces embroidered, and are blushed with beeswax (Actually, tested and... Food Grade!!! haha). They are each given a hug in Alana's home, courtesy, baby Claire. ♥

Approx. 10" in height.

name: Ruffle Tubey Dress - Tuscan Coral
description: Ruffle fabric tubey dress with ribbon halter closure. Fits Wooly Babes Dolls, American Girl Dolls, and most 15" Waldorf Dolls. Please email before purchasing if unsure of fit. alana@woolybabes.com Sewn by Keren, our seamstress from Sweet Pea Sewing

name: Custom Simple Dress
description: Beautiful simple dress with satin ribbon detail and shoulder bows. Fits Wooly Babes Dolls, American Girl Dolls, and most 15" Waldorf Dolls. Please email before purchasing if unsure of fit. alana@woolybabes.com Fabric Selections Please allow up to 2 weeks for the clothing completion after purchase and directions finalization. Sewn by Keren, our seamstress from Sweet Pea Sewing
